titles.title: Day Is Dying In The West (familiar easy very n

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy holy holy Lord God of hosts Heaven and earth are full of Thee Heaven and earth are praising Thee O Lord Most High{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Day is dying in the west Heaven is touching earth with rest Wait and worship while the night Sets her evening lamps alight Thro' all the sky{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord of life beneath the dome Of the universe Thy home Gather us who seek Thy face To the fold of Thy embrace For Thou art nigh{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}While the deepning shadows fall Heart of Love enfolding all Through the glory and the grace Of the stars that veil Thy face Our hearts ascend{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When forever from our sight Pass the stars the day the night Lord of angels on our eyes Let eternal morning rise And shadows end{/lang-eng}
